DataElement.preferredName: Jaw Bone Necrosis Osteomyelitis Person Personal Medical History Ind-2
DataElement.preferredDefinition: the yes/no indicator that asks whether osteonecrosis or osteomyelitis of the jaw is present.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Jaw Bone Necrosis Osteomyelitis Person Personal Medical History
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: information relating to a person's personal medical history (an account of all medical events and problems a person has experienced) and jaw (the bones that hold the teeth) bone necrosis (death of bone tissue due to traumatic or nontraumatic causes) or osteomyelitis (an acute or chronic inflammation of the bone and its structures due to infection with pyogenic bacteria).

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: The bones of the skull that frame the mouth and serve to open it; the bones that hold the teeth.:Death of bone tissue due to traumatic or nontraumatic causes.:An acute or chronic inflammation of the bone and its structures due to infection with pyogenic bacteria.:Person; a human being.

Concepts.definition: The bones of the skull that frame the mouth and serve to open it; the bones that hold the teeth.
Death of bone tissue due to traumatic or nontraumatic causes.
An acute or chronic inflammation of the bone and its structures due to infection with pyogenic bacteria.

Property.preferredDefinition: an account of all medical events and problems a person has experienced.

Concepts.definition: A record of a patient's background regarding health and the occurrence of disease events of the individual. In addition, personal medical history may be a variable in epidemiologic studies.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: indication of the presence and extent of disease.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The preferred Value Domain to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.administrativeNotes: 2022.12.28 Alt VM added per ticket request CADSR0001837. aj

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Conceptual domain that includes value meanings to be used for Indicator Value Meanings such as Yes, No, Unknown, No Applicable

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A caDSR representation term that is used to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no

Concepts.definition: A response or indicator that can have a value of either yes or no.

RepresentationTerm.changeDescription: 10.3.20 TL changed WFS from RETIRED PHASED OUT to RETIRED ARCHIVED. Changed Workflow Status DBW 04-27-2016

ValueDomain.changeDescription: 8/29/17 tt added CSI per Round 5 finalization task. 3/12/17 jk added Standard reg status; ownership transfered from CTEP to NCI Standards with concurrence of CTEP/Brian Campbell. jk

ReferenceDocuments.name: Has the patient had osteonecr
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has the patient had osteonecrosis or osteomyelitis of the jaw since submission of the last follow-up form
